CHAT.comment: WILLIAM CRAWFORD, ET AL., Petitioners v. MARION COUNTY ELECTION BOARD, ET AL.; and INDIANA DEMOCRATIC PARTY, ET AL., Petitioners v. TODD ROKITA, INDIANA SECRETARY OF STATE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL M. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS M. FISHER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL M. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
